original_text: Remember this too: Later, Isaac's wife, Rebekah, gave birth to twins. Those two sons had the same father, who was our ancestor, Isaac.
korean_text: 그뿐 아니라 또한 리브가가 우리 조상 이삭 한 사람으로 말미암아 임신하였는데

sentences.original_text: Later, Isaac's wife, Rebekah, gave birth to twins
sentences.korean_translation: 나중에 이삭의 아내 리브가가 쌍둥이를 낳았다

sentences.original_text: Those two sons had the same father
sentences.korean_translation: 그 두 아들은 같은 아버지를 가졌다
